constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Hogsmill Valley Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Alteration and conversion of single storey side extension with associated changes to fenestration. Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed alteration and conversion of single storey side extension with associated changes to fenestration. Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.  falls within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
